name: SingHeads
description:
Introducing SINGHEADS. A brand new, properly free singing app. Watch your Bitmoji™ spring to life, Then check out today’s latest track, And see if you can stay in tune. Don’t worry, your Bitmoji™ will spare your blushes! SINGHEADS sends you straight to Snapchat™ So you can edit & share with your real friends in seconds.
 
*PICK FROM THE LATEST TRACKS*
We have all your favourites. Sing the HITS with Karaoke versions of Despacito, Shape of You and Shotgun. Or revisit the CLASSICS with songs made famous by Robbie Williams, Queen and ABBA.
 
*BRING YOUR BITMOJI™ TO LIFE*
Inhabit your Bitmoji™ in glorious 3D augmented reality. Craft your 'you' from a huge collection of faces, hairstyles, and accessories.
 
*SHARE YOUR PERFORMANCE ON SNAPCHAT™*
Send your antics straight to Snapchat™ and then share them with your real friends.
